comment.body: Hello Pablo. I'm from Argentina too. Hint: here, we eat cats (not really)
Come on man, you don't know that. It's like DuckDuckGo saying "Fuck it, Google exists!"
You do what you like, of course. I'm just saying IT IS GOOD TO HAVE ALTERNATIVES. At least I like to have them.

You can add other features that make your site unique. You don't even have a link to bwoi in your own profile, so I have to go get it from somewhere. There are things you can do to keep the project alive, but again, if you just don't want to, don't waste your time, you don't have a contract with your users.
Whichcraft! I swear I WAS seeing you as Bwoi but now you're Alex and I see a (regular) link. :D
You are messing with my head. Did you change the owner of the post or something's broken...? In the recent activity I can see that at first it was "Bwoi's post" and now is "Alex's post"...
